publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2772 Mr Brian Monteith: GB Curling Team Gold Medal at Winter Olympicsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the five Scottish members of the Great Britain curling team, Rhona Martin, Janice Rankin, Fiona MacDonald, Debbie Knox and Margaret Morton, who have won the Gold Medal in the 2002 Salt Lake City Winter Olympics; admires their great determination, perseverance and skill in overcoming the odds and predictions of the bookies and pundits and winning the first Gold medal for Britain in curling since the sport became an Olympic event and the first Gold medal for Britain for 18 years; welcomes the fresh interest shown in the sport, and looks forward to a warm welcome for the team when it returns home and increased participation in curling throughout Britain. Supported by: Mr David Davidson*
